name: The Sun Snatcher
description:
You are The Sun Snatcher, and you stole Ra's power of orbs. In this 2D platformer survival game you'll have to stand your ground against Ra's hordes of enemies to survive as long as you can. You'll be aided by the power the Ra's orbs, which you'll embody.

How far can you get?

Controls:

W, S, A, D: Movement (jump, descend, move left and right respectively)

Arrows or point and click: Shoot in specified direction

Q, E: Change orb (left or right direction respectively)

Escape: Pause or exit
